metadata.title: CVE-2016-2097 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in Action View in Ruby on Rails before3.2.22.2 and 4.x before 4.1.14.2 allows remote attackers to read arbitraryfiles by leveraging an application's unrestricted use of the render methodand providing a .. (dot dot) in a pathname.  NOTE: this vulnerabilityexists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2016-0752.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby-actionpack-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
rails-4.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
